house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1998 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 1 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Dining/LivingCombo, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Kitchen Island, Pantry
